quests.name: Breaking the Ice
objectives: Follow Elsa to the Ice Cavern.

Gather the following Ingredients for the Warmth of Summer Potion:
  ‧ 1 Vial of Ocean Water
  ‧ 5 Sunflower
  ‧ 5 Lemon
  ‧ 2 Sugarcane
  ‧ 3 Garlic
Craft the Warmth of Summer Potion.
Bring the Warmth of Summer Potion to Elsa.
Enter the Ice Cavern
Clear the ice blocks inside the Ice Cavern.
Follow Elsa to Explore the Ice Cavern.
Talk to Elsa
Find the origin of the sound deeper in the Cave.
Pick up the Blue Crest from the ground.
Talk to Elsa
Place the Blue Crest on the sculpted wall.
rewards: Upgrade Pickaxe to clear small ice blocks

quests.name: What Home Feels Like
objectives:
Gather the Ingredients for the Dandelion Syrup:
  ‧ 1 Lemon
  ‧ 5 Dandelion
  ‧ 3 Garlic
  ‧ 2 Onion
  ‧ 1 Empty Vial
Bring the Ingredients to Elsa.
Catch the Glittering Herring in the Glade on a rainy day.

Make sure to have the Ingredients in your Inventory:
  ‧ Wheat
  ‧ Butter
Cook an Arendellian Fish Pie
Make sure you have Arendellian Pickled Herring in your Inventory.
Make sure you have Arendellian Fish Pie in your Inventory.
Bring the meals to Elsa
Dig out Elsa's Secret Chest near the Ice Cavern.
Pick up Elsa's Secret Chest near the Ice Cavern.
Give the Arendellian Arendellian Extra-Pickled Herring to Elsa.
Place the Purple Crest on the wall of the Ice Cavern.
Return to Elsa

quests.name: The Singing Ice
objectives: Follow Elsa deeper into the Ice Cavern.

Gather the Flowers to turn them into an Icy Bouquet.
  ‧ White Daisy
  ‧ Red Falling Penstemon
  ‧ Pink Bromeliad
Bring the Flowers back to Elsa.

Gather the Ingredients for the spell:
  ‧ 5 Ice Chunk
  ‧ 1 Icy Bouquet
  ‧ 1 Vial of Freezing Water
  ‧ 3 Snowball
Craft the Cold of Winter Potion.
Return to Elsa
Break the big ice block where the sound comes from.
Get the Orange Crest from the Ice Cavern.
Place the new Orange Crest on the wall of the Ice Cavern.
Return to Elsa
rewards: Upgrade Pickaxe to break large ice blocks

quests.name: The Ice Cavern Mystery
objectives: Go to the Ice Cavern.
Follow Elsa to the ice statues.
Talk to Anna
Take the Green Crest from Anna's House.
Finally the last Crest! Place it on the wall of the Ice Cavern.
Return to Elsa.

Place the following items on the pedestals:
  ‧ Arendellian Pickled Herring
  ‧ White Passion Lily
  ‧ Carrot
  ‧ Gold Ingot
Talk to Elsa
Open the Icy Chest to reveal its contents.
Give what you've found to Elsa.
